TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Logger extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger
Public MustInherit Class Logger Implements ILogger
public ref class Logger abstract : Microsoft::Build::Framework::ILogger

summary.span: 在衍生表單中覆寫時，提供可處理由 MSBuild 引擎引發之事件的記錄器功能。

span.span: When overridden in a derived form, provides functionality for loggers that handle events raised by the MSBuild engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此抽象類別會提供方法和屬性的預設實作介面。This abstract class provides default implementations for the methods and properties of the interface. 這個類別只能衍生表單中執行個體化。This class can only be instantiated in a derived form. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何撰寫基本記錄器回應建置事件。The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events. [!code-csharp[msbuild_BasicLogger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BasicLogger/CS/msbuild_BasicLogger.cs#1)]

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, subscribes the logger to specific events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須執行初始化邏輯，並建置所發行的事件訂閱的衍生類別中覆寫這個方法。This method must be overridden in the derived class to perform initialization logic and to subscribe to build events published by . ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何撰寫基本記錄器回應建置事件。The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events. [!code-csharp[msbuild_BasicLogger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BasicLogger/CS/msbuild_BasicLogger.cs#1)]

Public Overridable Sub Shutdown ()
public: virtual void Shutdown();

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，釋放在初始化時或在建置期間配置給記錄器的資源。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, releases the resources allocated to the logger at the time of initialization or during the build.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以執行關機邏輯，例如釋放取得的資源在衍生類別中被覆寫。This method can be overridden in the derived class to perform shutdown logic, such as releasing acquired resources. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何撰寫基本記錄器回應建置事件。The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events. summary.span: 取得或設定在事件記錄檔中顯示的詳細資料層級。

span.span: Gets or sets the level of detail to show in the event log.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 記錄器自由選擇記錄的事件時，詳細指導方針建立一致的使用者體驗。While a logger is free to choose the events it logs, following the verbosity guidelines creates a consistent user experience.
